channel.title: AI on Akshat Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Akshat Gupta

item.title: What Are Vector Databases?
item.description: An in-depth, beginner-friendly guide to vector databases, what they are, how they work, and where they fit in GenAI systems.

item.title: What is an Ontology in a Knowledge Graph?
item.description: A beginner-friendly explanation of what an ontology is, why it’s central to knowledge graphs, and how it helps machines understand complex relationships.
